Mihai Surdeanu, Razvan Bunsecu, Roxana Girju, Vasile Rus,
and Paul Morarescu. 2000. FALCON: Boosting knowledge
for answer engines. In Proceedings of the 9th Text REtrieval
Conference.

S. Harabagiu, D. Moldovan, M. Pasca, M. Surdeanu, R. Mihalcea,
R. Girju, V. Rus, F. Lacatusu, P. Morarescu, and R. Bunescu.

LCC's Question-Answering Server. In Proceedings of the

S. Harabagiu, D. Moldovan, C. Clark, M. Bowden, A. Hickl, and
P. Wang. 2005. Employing Two Question Answering Systems
in TREC 2005. In Proceedings of the Fourteenth Text REtrieval

Andrew Hickl, Patrick Wang, John Lehamnn, and Sanda
Harabagiu. 2006a. Ferret: Interactive Question-Answering
for Real-World Research Environments. In Proceedings of the

Andrew Hickl, John Williams, Jeremy Bensley, Kirk Roberts,

Andrew Hickl, Kirk Roberts, Bryan Rink, Jeremy Bensely, Tobias

ing with LCC's Chaucer-2 at TREC 2007. In Proceedings of

V. Krishnan, S. Das, and S. Chakrabarti. 2005. Enhanced answer
type inference from questions using sequential models. In Pro-
ceedings of EMNLP.

X. Li and D. Roth. 2002. Learning question classifiers. In

tics (COLING).

George A. Miller. 1995. WordNet: a lexical database for English.
